hadiths.text: Nafi reported on the authority of Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:Whichever tree is bought with its roots, and if it is fecundatedits fruit would belong to one who has grafted it except when the provision is laid down by the buyer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاعَ نَخْلاً عَلَيْهَا ثَمَرٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who sells date palms on which there are dates
